works.description:
This is an article, written by Dr. Limor  
Ezioni (as stated in the file itself), I am writing on behalf of her, as  
her research assistant.
We are unsure who had uploaded the version of the article (it may have  
originaly been uploaded by a coleague working on it), but we wish to remove  
it, as it's now available to the public, and is limiting Dr. Ezioni's  
ability to use the material for other purposes.We are unable to remove it  
ourselves, as we are not certain who had uploaded it originaly.
